briefdescription.para: Starts the modem in network operation mode.
Starts the modem in gnss operation mode.
Query gnss position form the modem.

simplesect.para: 0 on success. If no fix is acquired yet -EAGAIN is returned. Otherwise <0 is returned.
Number of sms read on success. Otherwise -1 is returned.

The buffer structure needs to be initialized to the size of the sms buffer. When this function finishes successful, nsms will be set to the number of sms read. If the whole structure is filled a subsequent read may be needed.

detaileddescription.para: Delete a sms at a given index.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the sms in memory.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *server, const char *user, const char *passwd, const char *file, const char *path)
memberdef.name: mdm_sim7080_ftp_get_start

parameterdescription.para: User name for the ftp server.
Path to the file on the server.

simplesect.para: 0 if the session was started. Otherwise -1 is returned.

detaileddescription.para: Read data from a ftp get session.

parameterdescription.para: Initialize to the size of dst. Gets set to the nuber of bytes actually read.
